name: Azure DevOps
description: This plugin provides services of Azure DevOps such as Boards and Repos

settings.help_text: Enter the base URL for Azure DevOps API
Enter the app ID for the OAuth app registered with Azure DevOps
Enter the client secret for the OAuth app registered with Azure DevOps.

The secret key used to encrypt and decrypt the OAuth token and webhook secret.
Regenerating the secret will require all users to re-connect their accounts to Azure DevOps and create new subscriptions as existing ones will no longer be authenticated.

The secret key used to authenticate incoming requests to notification webhook used for subscriptions.
Regenerating the secret will require all users to create new subscriptions as existing ones will no longer be authenticated.
